thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com | 4 of 101
thread.title: Ivan Marević

author: Ivan Marević
title: Ivan Marević
text:
Written my first review on Truspilot of a big Chinese company, lots of products, great prices, etc., etc... that i genuinly felt was in my case unfair and sensed their practice of manipulating customers.
After they replied on my review, Truspilot was pushed to remove my review. I was explaining my review in several mails to Trust pilot, but in the end the bigger company won! I stoped explaining it to trust pilot, I don't have anything to gain beeing a Don Quijote and in your policy you removed my review. But I washed the company on other places.
